entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 03:20 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: SSE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 early in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
